dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits consisting of 60,000 training images and 10,000 test images, each of size 28x28 pixels. Used for evaluating image classification under perspective transformations.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Johannes Stallkamp
Marc Schlipsing
Jan Salmen
Christian Igel
dcterms:description: A dataset of traffic signs from the German road network, containing 39,209 training images and 12,630 test images across 43 classes. Used to evaluate robustness to perspective transformations and real-world conditions.
dcterms:title: GTSRB

dcterms:description: A non-public dataset of official identity documents, including UK Driving Licences, with 1,000 training and 500 test images. Used for evaluating document alignment under challenging conditions such as occlusions and varying resolutions.
dcterms:title: IDocDB
